  top: 80px;

  .modal-container[_ngcontent-sc0] {
    width: 50%;

  position: absolute;

  position: fixed;

  visibility: visible;

id="div-gpt-ad-1233902021055"></div></div></ad-unit><content-block><!----><!----><div class="row ng-star-inserted"><div class="col-xs-12"><div class="header"><h2 class="h__header">Livros da Rita</h2><h2 class="sub sub__header">Veja onde comprar</h2></div></div></div><div class="row row__grid ng-star-inserted"><!----><div class="col-xs-12 ng-star-inserted"><!----><!----><article class="tile ng-star-inserted"><a class="tile-action" target="_blank" href="https://www.panelinha.com.br/loja/livros-rita-lobo"><div class="thumbnail thumbnail__tile"><img alt="Imagem da receita" class="thumbnail-img" defaultimage="/assets/img/img-placeholder.png"></div><p class="tag">Complete sua coleção</p><h3>E conheça os outros títulos que recomendamos</h3></a></article><!----><!----></div></div></content-block></section><section class="ng-star-inserted"><ad-unit class="ads-banner-large" id="home_leaderboard_btf_between_blocks"><div class="ad-unit ads-banner-large" classname="ad-unit ads-banner-large"><div class="ad-container" id="div-gpt-ad-1303919023476"></div></div></ad-unit><content-block><!----><!----><div class="row bonita</h2></div></div></div><div class="row row__grid ng-star-inserted"><!----><div class="col-sm-6 col-xs-12 ng-star-inserted"><!----><!----><article class="tile ng-star-inserted"><a defaultimage="/assets/img/img-placeholder.png"></div><p class="tag">Louças e roupas de mesa</p><h3>Conheça todos os produtos Acervo Panelinha</h3></a></article><!----><!----></div><div class="col-sm-6
